name: Rusted Will
description:
Rusted Will is a game that was created in the 2018 Design Week in Sheridan College. The theme for this project was to make a controller using the makey-makey controller. Our Group made a tank game that had self-built paddles, buttons and switches which controlled a tank.

Rusted will is a game that is a tank shoot'em up survival game where the player has to get the highest score possible. 

Controls:

F Key to rotate left.

G Key to rotate right

F & G key to move foward.

Space to Shoot ( Hold Space to shoot a charged shot )

Use the mouse to aim where you want to shoot.

How I helped out in the project:

Worked on the 3D models that is seen in the game as well as planning, creating cardbroad controls and wiring them to the makey - makey controller.
